name: Premium Wireless Headphones
description: High-quality wireless headphones with active noise cancellation and 30-hour battery life. Premium sound quality with deep bass and crystal-clear highs.

name: Smart Watch Pro
description: Advanced fitness tracking, heart rate monitoring, and smartphone notifications. Water-resistant with a vibrant AMOLED display.

name: Minimalist Backpack
description: Sleek, durable backpack perfect for daily commutes or weekend adventures. Multiple compartments with padded laptop sleeve.

name: Mechanical Keyboard RGB
description: Premium mechanical keyboard with customizable RGB lighting and tactile switches. Perfect for gaming and productivity.

name: Leather Wallet
description: Handcrafted genuine leather wallet with RFID protection. Slim design with multiple card slots and bill compartment.

name: Portable Speaker
description: Waterproof Bluetooth speaker with 360-degree sound and 12-hour battery. Perfect for outdoor adventures.

name: Sunglasses Classic
description: Polarized sunglasses with UV400 protection. Stylish design suitable for any occasion.

name: Wireless Mouse
description: Ergonomic wireless mouse with precision tracking and rechargeable battery. Silent clicks for quiet environments.

name: Travel Mug
description: Insulated stainless steel travel mug that keeps drinks hot for 6 hours or cold for 12 hours. Leak-proof lid.

name: USB-C Hub
description: Multi-port USB-C hub with HDMI, USB 3.0, and SD card reader. Compact design for on-the-go productivity.

name: Yoga Mat Premium
description: Extra thick non-slip yoga mat with carrying strap. Eco-friendly materials for comfortable practice.

name: Phone Stand Adjustable
description: Sturdy aluminum phone stand with adjustable angles. Compatible with all smartphones and tablets.
